title: v1.6.3.9-v6 Docs Update
details:
Updated documentation from v1.6.3.9-v5 to v1.6.3.9-v6 with the following key features:

Key v6 Features (Sidebar & Background Cleanup):
1. GAP 11: Simplified Init - Manager reduced from ~8 state variables to 4
2. GAP 13: Unified Barrier - Single barrier with resolve-only semantics
3. GAP 14: Render Queue Priority - Revision as PRIMARY over saveId for dedup
4. GAP 15: Dead Code Removal - ~218 lines removed (CONNECTION_STATE, port stubs)
5. GAP 16: Unified Routing - Enhanced _routeRuntimeMessage() with switch-based routing
6. GAP 17: State Hash - stateHashAtQueue field for render queue validation
7. GAP 18: Lint Fixes - 15+ unused import/variable warnings fixed
8. GAP 20: Response Helper - _buildResponse() for correlationId responses
9. Constants Centralized - WRITE_IGNORE_WINDOW_MS, STORAGE_CHANGE_COOLDOWN_MS moved to src/constants.js

Files Updated:
- .github/copilot-instructions.md (15KB limit maintained)
- README.md (9.6KB)
- All 13 agent files in .github/agents/

Version references changed from 1.6.3.9-v5 to 1.6.3.9-v6 in all files.
